name: Lightscape (Battou59, LoorTristan)
description:
What is Lightscape ?

Lightscape is a cooperative arcade game in which two players must cooperate to find the exit of a labirynth. Be careful because a ghost is chasing you. Fortunately you and your teammate are able to teleport to each other. 

This game was created as a project for our studies, I sincerely hope you will enjoy it !                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                

Controls

Both players must be on the same keyboard.

PLAYER 1 (Blue) :

Move : ZQSD

Teleportation : A

Put a lamp : E

PLAYER 2 (Orange) :

Move : Directionals arrows

Teleportation : Numpad 0

Put a lamp : Numpad 1
